name: Just Fine Dust Time
description:
WASD: Move Right Click: Attack Left Click: Interaction (Water-Hold Tree-Water)

*Fog doesn't work in WebGL, so it can be hard to tell. sorry.*

tutorial

Don't let the tree in the center disappear.

Trees can be grown by watering them.

You can find water by browsing around.

Trees purify fine dust.

So if you get away from the trees, you'll have a huge fine dust storm.

Do not stay away from the tree for a long time.

Sometimes gift boxes fall from the sky. You can get water, a knife, a minimap, and a mask from the gift box!

Watch out for ghosts!

Ghosts harm you and your trees.

When a ghost approaches, left-click to attack it and destroy it.

As the Wave increases, so makes the difficulty.

Good luck!

the cursor has been removed.
